A.title: Format Version
A.description: A version that tells minecraft what type of data format can be expected when reading this file.

D.title: Category
D.description: Determines which category this block/item will be placed under in the inventory and crafting table container screens.

E.title: Allow Off Hand
E.description: The allow off hand component determines whether the item can be placed in the off hand slot of the inventory.

value.title: Value
value.description: Whether the item can be placed in the off hand slot

F_use_on_item.title: Allowed Block
F_use_on_item.description: A block descriptor that allows to be placed.

F.title: Block Placer
F.description: Planter item component. planter items are items that can be planted.

block.description: Set the placement block name for the planter item.
block.title: Block

use_on.description: List of block descriptors that contain blocks that this item can be used on. If left empty, all blocks will be allowed.
use_on.title: Use On

replace_block_item.title: Replace Block Item
replace_block_item.description: Allows you to specify that this item should replace the default item created for the data-driven block it places.

H.title: Bundle Interaction
H.description: Adds bundle-specific interactions and tooltip to the item.

num_viewable_slots.description: The maximum number of slots in the bundle viewable by the plater. Can be from 1 to 64. Default is 12.

I.title: Can Destroy In Creative
I.description: The can destroy in creative component determines if the item will break blocks in creative when swinging.

value.title: Value
value.description: Whether the item can destroy blocks while in creative

J.title: Compostable
J.description: Allows items to be compostable in the composter block.

composting_chance.description: The chance of this item generating a compost layer when supplied to the composter block.
composting_chance.title: Composting Chance

BA.title: Cooldown
BA.description: Cool down time for a component. After you use an item it becomes unusable for the duration specified by the `cool down time` setting in this component.

category.description: The type of cool down for this item.
category.title: Category

duration.description: The duration of time this item will spend cooling down before becoming usable again.
duration.title: Duration

type.title: Type
type.description: Defines the action the cooldown applies to, in a mutually exclusive way, so cooldowns for one action type do not affect the other

BC.title: Damage
BC.description: The damage component determines how much extra damage the item does on attack.

value.title: Value
value.description: How much extra damage the item does, must be a positive number.

BE.title: Entity Damage Source
BE.description: The types of damage an entity can receive.

BD.title: Damage Absorption
BD.description: It allows an item to absorb damage that would otherwise be dealt to its wearer. For this to happen, the item needs to be equipped in an armor slot. The absorbed damage reduces the item's durability, with any excess damage being ignored. Because of this, the item also needs a `minecraft:durability` component.

absorbable_causes.title: Absorbable Causes
absorbable_causes.description: List of damage causes that can be absorbed by the item. By default, no damage cause is absorbed.

BF.title: Digger
BF.description: Digger item. Component put on items that dig.

use_efficiency.title: Use Efficiency
use_efficiency.description: Toggles if the item will be used efficiently.

BG.title: Display Name
BG.description: Display Name item component. Display Names display the name of an item.
BG.$comment: Does not currently support single value parsing.

value.title: Value
value.description: Set the display name for an item.

BI.title: Sound Event
BI.description: Reference to a sound definition in "sound_definitions.json".

BH.title: Durability Sensor
BH.description: Defines both the durability threshold, and the effects emitted when that threshold is met.

durability.description: The effects are emitted when the item durability value is less than or equal to this value.

particle_type.description: Particle effect to emit when the threshold is met.

sound_event.title: Sound Event
sound_event.description: Sound effect to emit when the threshold is met.

BJ.title: Durability
BJ.description: Durability item component: how much damage can this item take before breaking.

max_durability.title: Maximum Durability
max_durability.description: Maximum durability is the amount of damage that this item can take before breaking.

CA.title: Dyeable
CA.description: Enables custom items to be dyed in cauldrons.

default_color.title: Default Color
default_color.description: Color to use by default. If you do not want a default color you can leave the "default_color" off and the texture will be the same as if you did not have the component until it is dyed.

CB.title: Enchantable
CB.description: The enchantable component determines what enchantments can be applied to the item.

slot.title: Slot
slot.description: The slot type to be used to determine which enchantment types this item can be enchanted with.

additionalProperties.title: State Value
additionalProperties.description: The key of property is the name of the block state/property, the value must be the same as the block properties accepted values.

tags.description: A condition using Molang queries that results to true/false that can be used to query for blocks with certain tags.

CC.title: Entity Placer
CC.description: Entity placer item component. You can specifiy allowed blocks that the item is restricted to.

entity.title: Entity
entity.description: The entity to be placed in the world.

dispense_on.title: Dispense On
dispense_on.description: List of block descriptors that contain blocks that this item can be dispensed on. If left empty, all blocks will be allowed.

items.title: Block Descriptor
items.description: Block that item can be dispensed on.

use_on.title: Use On
use_on.description: List of block descriptors that contain blocks that this item can be used on. If left empty, all blocks will be allowed.

items.title: Block Descriptor
items.description: Block that item can be used on

CF.title: Fire Resistant
CF.description: Determines whether an item is immune to burning when dropped in fire or lava

CG.title: Food
CG.description: When an item has a food component, it becomes edible to the player.

can_always_eat.title: Can Always Eat
can_always_eat.description: If true you can always eat this item (even when not hungry), defaults to false.

nutrition.title: Nutrition
nutrition.description: How much nutrition does this food item give the player when eaten.

saturation_modifier.title: Saturation Modifier
saturation_modifier.description: Saturation Modifier is used in this formula: (nutrition * saturation_modifier * 2) when appling the saturation buff. Which happens when you eat the item.

using_converts_to.title: Using Converts To
using_converts_to.description: When used, convert the *this* item to the one specified by `using_converts_to`.

CH.title: Fuel
CH.description: Fuel component. Allows this item to be used as fuel in a furnace to `cook` other items.

duration.title: Duration
duration.description: How long in seconds will this fuel cook items for.

CI.title: Glint
CI.description: The glint component determines whether the item has the enchanted glint render effect on it

value.title: Value
value.description: Whether the item has the glint effect.

CJ.title: Hand Equipped
CJ.description: This component determines if an item is rendered like a tool while in hand.

value.title: Value
value.description: If the item is rendered like a tool while in hand.

DA.title: Icon
DA.description: The icon item componenent determines the icon to represent the item in the UI and elsewhere.

textures.title: Textures
textures.description: Contains key-value pairs of textures used by the item

additionalProperties.title: Texture
additionalProperties.description: The key from the resource_pack/textures/item_texture.json `texture_data` object associated with the texture file Example: blaze_powder.

default.title: Default Texture
default.description: The key from the resource_pack/textures/item_texture.json `texture_data` object associated with the texture file Example: blaze_powder.

DB.title: Interact Button
DB.description: A boolean or string that determines if the interact button is shown in touch controls, and what text is displayed on the button. When set to 'true', the default 'Use Item' text will be used.

DC_conditions.title: Conditions
DC_conditions.description: Conditions that need to be satisfied for a specific effect of a kinetic weapon to be applied.

max_duration.description: Time, in ticks, during which the effect can be applied after "delay" elapses. If negative, the effect is applied indefinitely.

min_relative_speed.description: Minimum relative speed of the user with respect to the target (projected onto the view vector via a dot product) required for the effect to be applied.

min_speed.description: Minimum user's speed (projected onto the view vector via a dot product) required for the effect to be applied.

DC.title: Kinetic Weapon
DC.description: Allows an item to deal kinetic damage and its effects. This happens every tick while in use, in a straight line along the user's view vector, with damage computed based on both the user's and the target's velocity projected onto the view vector (via a dot product). The more the user and target move toward each other, and the more this movement is aligned with the user's view vector, the higher the damage. After "damage_multiplier" and "damage_modifier" are applied, the resulting damage is floored to the nearest lower integer.

creative_reach.title: Creative Reach
creative_reach.description: Defines the reach used when the user is in Creative Mode. Defaults to "reach" if unspecified.

damage_conditions.title: Damage Conditions
damage_conditions.description: Conditions that need to be satisfied for damage to be applied. If not specified, damage is not applied.

damage_modifier.title: Damage Modifier
damage_modifier.description: Value added to the the scaled dot product (after applying "damage_multiplier").

damage_multiplier.title: Damage Multiplier
damage_multiplier.description: Value multiplied to sum of the dot products of the user and target's velocity vectors projected onto the view vector.

delay.title: Delay
delay.description: Time, in ticks, after which kinetic damage and its effects start being applied.

dismount_conditions.title: Dismount Conditions
dismount_conditions.description: Conditions that need to be satisfied for riders to be dismounted. If not specified, riders cannot be dismounted.

hitbox_margin.title: Hitbox Margin
hitbox_margin.description: Added tolerance to the view vector raycast for detecting entity collisions.

knockback_conditions.title: Knockback Conditions
knockback_conditions.description: Conditions that need to be satisfied for knockback to be applied. If not specified, knockback is not applied.

reach.title: Reach
reach.description: Defines the range (in blocks) along the user's view vector where entities can be hit. Only targets within this distance are considered. Block collisions between the user and target block damage and its effects.

DD.title: Liquid Clipped
DD.description: The liquid clipped component determines whether the item interacts with liquid blocks on use.

value.title: Value
value.description: Whether the item interacts with liquid blocks on use.

DE.title: Max Stack Size
DE.description: The max stack size component determines how many of the item can be stacked together.

value.title: Value
value.description: How many of the item that can be stacked.

DF.title: Piercing Weapon
DF.description: Allows an item to deal damage to all entities detected in a straight line along the user's view vector. Items with this component cannot destroy blocks, as the attack action always takes priority, regardless of what the user is looking at.

creative_reach.title: Creative Reach
creative_reach.description: Defines the reach used when the user is in Creative Mode. Defaults to "reach" if unspecified.

hitbox_margin.title: Hitbox Margin
hitbox_margin.description: Added tolerance to the view vector raycast for detecting entity collisions.

reach.title: Reach
reach.description: Defines the range (in blocks) along the user's view vector where entities can be hit. Only targets within this distance are considered. Block collisions between the user and target block damage and its effects.

DG.title: Projectile
DG.description: Compels the item shoot, like an arrow.  Pair with minecraft:shooter for dispensers or as ammunition.  Pair with minecraft:throwable to set the entity spawned.

minimum_critical_power.title: Minimum Critical Power
minimum_critical_power.description: How long you must charge a projectile for it to critically hit.

projectile_entity.title: Projectile Entity
projectile_entity.description: The entity to be fired as a projectile.

DH.title: Record
DH.description: Used by record items to play music.

comparator_signal.title: Comparator Signal
comparator_signal.description: Signal strength for comparator blocks to use, from 1 - 13

duration.title: Duration
duration.description: Duration of sound event in seconds, float value.

sound_event.title: Sound Event
sound_event.description: Sound event type: 13, cat, blocks, chirp, far, mall, mellohi, stal, strad, ward, 11, wait, pigstep, otherside, 5, relic.

DI.title: Rarity
DI.description: Specifies the base rarity and subsequently color of the item name when the player hovers the cursor over the item.

value.description: Sets the base rarity of the item. The rarity of an item automatically increases when enchanted, either to Rare when the base rarity is Common or Uncommon, or Epic when the base rarity is Rare.

EA_object_item_descriptor.title: Item Descriptor
EA_object_item_descriptor.description: An object that describes an item.

tags.description: [UNDOCUMENTED] A Molang expression ran against item or block to match.

item_tag.description: [UNDOCUMENTED] A tag to lookup item or block by.

EB.title: Molang Number
EB.description: The minecraft molang definition that results in a float.

DJ.title: Repairable
DJ.description: Repairable item component: how much damage can this item repair, what items can repair it.

items.title: Items
items.description: Items that can be used to repeair it

use_offhand.title: Use Offhand
use_offhand.description: If ammo can be in offhand

search_inventory.title: Search Inventory
search_inventory.description: If ammo can be stored in the inventory

use_in_creative.title: Use In Creative
use_in_creative.description: If it needs ammo to be used in creative

charge_on_draw.title: Charge On Draw
charge_on_draw.description: Charge on draw? Default is set to false.

max_draw_duration.title: Maximum Draw Duration
max_draw_duration.description: Draw Duration. Default is set to 0.

scale_power_by_draw_duration.title: Scale Power By Draw Duration
scale_power_by_draw_duration.description: Scale power by draw duration? Default is set to false.

ED.title: Should Despawn
ED.description: Should despawn component determines if the item should eventually despawn while floating in the world

value.title: Value
value.description: Whether the item should eventually despawn while floating in the world

EE.title: Stacked By Data
EE.description: The stacked by data component determines if the same item with different aux values can stack.

value.title: Value
value.description: Also defines whether the item actors can merge while floating in the world.

EF.title: Storage Item
EF.description: Storage Items can be used by other components to store other items within this item.

allow_nested_storage_items.title: Allow Nested Storage Items
allow_nested_storage_items.description: Determines whether another Storage Item is allowed inside of this item. Default is true.

allowed_items.title: Allowed Items
allowed_items.description: List of items that are exclusively allowed in this Storage Item. If empty all items are allowed.

banned_items.title: Banned Items
banned_items.description: List of items that are not allowed in this Storage Item.

max_slots.title: Max Slots
max_slots.description: The maximum number of different item stacks. Maximum is 64. Default is 64.

EG.title: Storage Weight Limit
EG.description: Specifies the maximum weight limit that a storage item can hold

max_weight_limit.title: Max Weight Limit
max_weight_limit.description: The maximum allowed weight of the sum of all contained items.

EH.title: Storage Weight Modifier
EH.description: Specifies the maximum weight limit that a storage item can hold.

weight_in_storage_item.title: Weight In Storage Item
weight_in_storage_item.description: The weight of this item when inside another Storage Item. 0 means item is not allowed in another Storage Item.

EI.title: Swing Duration
EI.description: Duration, in seconds, of the item's swing animation played when mining or attacking. Affects visuals only and does not impact attack frequency or other gameplay mechanics.

value.description: Duration, in seconds, of the item's swing animation played when mining or attacking. Affects visuals only and does not impact attack frequency or other gameplay mechanics.

EJ.title: Swing Sounds
EJ.description: Overrides the swing sounds emitted by the user.

attack_critical_hit.title: Attack Critical Hit
attack_critical_hit.description: Sound played when an attack hits and deals critical damage.

attack_hit.title: Attack Hit
attack_hit.description: Sound played when an attack hits.

attack_miss.title: Attack Miss
attack_miss.description: Sound played when an attack misses or deals no damage due to invulnerability.

FA.title: Tags
FA.description: The tags component determines which tags an item has on it.

tags.title: Tags
tags.description: An array that can contain multiple item tags.

FB.title: Throwable
FB.description: Throwable item component. Throwable items, such as a snowball.

do_swing_animation.title: Do Swing Animation
do_swing_animation.description: Whether the item should use the swing animation when thrown. Default is set to false.

launch_power_scale.title: Launch Power Scale
launch_power_scale.description: The scale at which the power of the throw increases. Default is set to 1.0.

max_draw_duration.title: Maximum Draw Duration
max_draw_duration.description: The maximum duration to draw a throwable item. Default is set to 0.0.

min_draw_duration.title: Minimum Draw Duration
min_draw_duration.description: The minimum duration to draw a throwable item. Default is set to 0.0.

max_launch_power.title: Maximum Launch Power
max_launch_power.description: The maximum power to launch the throwable item. Default is set to 1.0.

scale_power_by_draw_duration.title: Scale Power By Draw Duration
scale_power_by_draw_duration.description: Whether or not the power of the throw increases with duration charged. Default is set to false.

FC.title: Use Animation
FC.description: This component determines which animation plays when using the item.

value.title: Value
value.description: Which animation to play when using the item.

FD.title: Use Modifiers
FD.description: How long to use before item is done being used.

movement_modifier.title: Movement Modifier
movement_modifier.description: Modifier value to scale the players movement speed when item is in use.

use_duration.title: Use Duration
use_duration.description: How long the item takes to use in seconds.

emit_vibrations.title: Emit Vibrations
emit_vibrations.description: Whether vibrations are emitted when the item starts or stops being used.

start_sound.title: Start Sound
start_sound.description: Sound played when the item starts being used.

protection.description: How much protection does the armor item have.
protection.title: Protection

dispensable.title: Dispensable
dispensable.description: Sets if the item can be dropped by a dispenser block

slot.title: Slot
slot.description: Which equipment slot the item can fit in

hides_player_location.title: Hides Player Location
hides_player_location.description: Defines whether Players are hidden on the Locator Bar and Locator Maps when eqipped in the appropriate wearable slot

identifier.title: Identifier
identifier.description: The identifier for this item. The name must include a namespace and must not use the Minecraft namespace unless overriding a Vanilla item.

is_experimental.description: If this item is experimental, it will only be registered if the world is marked as experimental.
is_experimental.title: Is Experimental

menu_category.title: Menu Category
menu_category.description: The Creative Category that includes the specified item.

group.title: Group
group.description: A translation string of an existing group in minecraft to group this block/item under

is_hidden_in_commands.title: Is Hidden In Commands
is_hidden_in_commands.description: Determines whether or not this item can be used with commands. Commands can use items by default
